body_html:
@leandroBorgesFerreira Great to hear it works now.

re:"did you compiled tensorflow in some different way" - As I mentioned earlier, a new target has been added and you can simply run below command to build the aar. But it's doing almost the same thing as the script provided by andrehentz:

bazel build --cxxopt='--std=c++11' -c opt --fat_apk_cpu=x86,x86_64,arm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a tensorflow/contrib/lite/java:tensorflow-lite
